articles.title: Man must explore, and this is exploration at its greatest
articles.subHeader: Problems look mighty small from 150 miles up
articles.author: Start Bootstrap
articles.content: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

articles.title: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
articles.author: Start Bootstrap
articles.content: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

articles.title: Science has not yet mastered prophecy
articles.subHeader: We predict too much for the next year and yet far too little for the next ten.
